name: Binary Bop
description:
Bop your way to 128

A rhythm game where you follow the binary numbers. Press the yellow key on the beat to increase your score. Complete your binary journey to see the end screen.

Press space to start the game once it has loaded.

Made by @aaaidan and @n00begon.
Original music by @aaaidan

Letter tiles from Kenney Assets

Made for Music Jam 2018
